title: 3 Crop Marks on tougher backs (Price Drop 2/25)
author: Luke

posts.post_title: 3 Crop Marks on tougher backs (Price Drop 2/25)
posts.post_content:
Dessau is graded pretty harshly.  Was expecting a 3 or 3.5.  Elberfeld has a the tough SC 350-460 factory 25 back.  Molesworth has just a small crop mark, but I haven't seen too many (maybe any?) SLers with crops, so I thought it was noteworthy.

Prices include shipping within the US

Dessau (no creases/wrinkles) $88
Elberfeld (no creases/wrinkles) $88
Molesworth $68
Really nice overprint Luke!!! Have a free bump on me~!
Bump for price drops on all 3.  Dessau and Elberfeld are extremely nice cards.  I think they are a great deal at this price (but we'll see if anyone agrees with me :p)
That Elberfeld crop marks surprises me.  Did they really ever intend on cutting it that close to the advertising?

[quote name="bn2cardz" post=1508639]That Elberfeld crop marks surprises me.  Did they really ever intend on cutting it that close to the advertising?[/QUOTE]

I noticed that too Andy, but it could be because the printing is slanted (at least it looks that way to me)
Maybe the marks were done before the backs were printed and they were
used for both cut and alignment marks for the back plates.
